column2:
Development, production or distribution of low-carbon intensity fuels (2), including liquid fuels with a carbon intensity ≤ 50 g COe/MJ or gaseous fuels with a carbon intensity ≤ 36 g
2
Examples of eligible fuel types include: hydrogen, ethanol, renewable diesel, co-processing
of biocrude, sustainable aviation fuel, synthetic fuel and renewable natural gas (either
synthetic natural gas from biomass or derived from processing biogas).
Activities that help reduce methane emissions from operations towards a specified
